sentences.en: Staffing levels in prisons are too low.
sentences.cn: 监狱里的人员配备数量太少。

sentences.en: Remember to factor in staffing costs when you are planning the project.
sentences.cn: 规划该项目时，记住要把雇人费用这个因素考虑进去。

sentences.en: It will slash staffing at its fleet of 770 stores, a move affecting some 3,000 employees.
sentences.cn: 该公司将在其770家门店进行裁员，会影响到约3000名员工。
